texts.EasyAbp.EShop.Payments:MultiStorePayment: 應該為每個商店創建支付
texts.EasyAbp.EShop.Payments:OrderIsNotInSpeci: 訂單({orderId})不在指定的支付({paymentId})中
texts.EasyAbp.EShop.Payments:AnotherRefundTask: 支付({id})存在進行中的退款任務
texts.EasyAbp.EShop.Payments:InvalidOrderRefun: 退款金額({refundAmount})對於支付(PaymentId: {paymentId}, OrderId: {orderId})不正確
texts.EasyAbp.EShop.Payments:InvalidOrderLineR: 退款金額({refundAmount})對於支付(PaymentId: {paymentId}, OrderId: {orderId}, OrderLineId: {orderLineId})不正確
texts.EasyAbp.EShop.Payments:InvalidOrderExtra: 退款金額({refundAmount})對於支付(PaymentId: {paymentId}, OrderId: {orderId}, ExtraFee: {extraFeeDisplayName})不正確
texts.EasyAbp.EShop.Payments:OrderLineNotFound: 不存在的訂單項 (訂單ID: {orderId}, 訂單項ID: {orderLineId})
texts.EasyAbp.EShop.Payments:OrderExtraFeeNotF: 不存在的訂單項 (訂單ID: {orderId}, name: {name}, key: {key})
